thing_id.description: The product identifier, such as ISBN. For example: isbn:123-456-789.

category.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

brand.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

production_date.description: The date of production of the item, e.g. vehicle.

release_date.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
